prodNameC: 亞培愛可信血紅素 A1c 檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
AxSYM HbA1c Reagent Pack (# 3L93-20)
1 Bottle (15.9 mL) Anti-HbA1c Antibody：Alkaline Phosphatase Conjugate in TRIS buffer with protein stabilizers. Minimum concentration：1 μg/mL
1 Bottle (10.9 mL) Sample Diluent in TRIS buffer.
1 Bottle (20.5 mL) Blocking Buffer in TRIS buffer.
1 Bottle (38.4 mL) Lysis Buffer containing detergent.
AxSYM HbA1c Controls (# 3L93-10)\n2 Bottles (5.0 mL each) of AxSYM HbA1c Controls. The controls yield the concentrations (% HbA1c)
Control L HbA1c Concentration (% HbA1c) 5.0, HbA1c Concentration Range (% HbA1c) 4.0-6.4；Control H HbA1c Concentration (% HbA1c) 10.0, HbA1c Concentration Range (% HbA1c) 7.2-12.8

AxSYM HbA1c Standard Calibrators (# 3L93-01)\n6 Bottles (2.0 mL each) of AxSYM HbA1c Standard Calibrators. The calibrators yield the concentrations (% HbA1c)：Standard CAL A：4.0、Standard CAL B：5.5、Standard CAL C：7.5、Standard CAL D：9.0、Standard CAL E：12.0、Standard CAL F：14.5
applicantName: 美商亞培股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民生東路三段49號5樓、6樓及51號6樓
efficacy: 利用免疫分析法，用於定量測試人類全血中的血紅素A1c。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: A.1660 品管材料(分析與非分析)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.7470 糖(基)化血紅素分析
